author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #44682 by @iarspider:

> As suggested in [#44645 (comment)](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44645#issuecomment-2045554062)

Includes the following clean up from #44870.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR.

Backport of #44682 and #44870 to CMSSW 14.0.x to keep the alpaka code consistent.
title: Do not include EventSetup record definitions in device code [14.0.x]
